SELECT DESIGN_ID designId , DESIGN_NAME designName , CONCAT('http://www.marpple.com', FILE_PATH) filePath , description description , price price , ifnull(width, 0) width , ifnull(height, 0) height FROM DESIGN WHERE USE_YN = 'Y'
AND PRICE = #price#
AND PREMIUM_YN = #premiumYn#
AND CATEGORY = #category#
ORDER BY DESIGN_ID
